Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services

Interface IVisitorService

All Known Implementing Classes:
VisitorService
public interface IVisitorService
This interface defines the contract for a service that manages authorized persons. It provides a method to retrieve all authorized persons.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    VisitorDTO
    deleteVisitor(Long docNumber)
    Deactivates a visitor by their document number.
    List<VisitorDTO>
    getAllVisitors(int page, int size)
    Retrieves a list of all authorized persons.
    VisitorDTO
    getVisitorByDocNumber(Long docNumber)
    This method finds and returns the visitor associated with the given document number.
    VisitorDTO
    saveOrUpdateVisitor(VisitorRequestDto authorizedRequestDto)
    Creates a new visitor or update based on the provided data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllVisitors

      List<VisitorDTO> getAllVisitors(int page, int size)
      Retrieves a list of all authorized persons.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number for pagination
      size - the size of the page
      Returns:
      A list of VisitorDTO representing all authorized persons.

    • saveOrUpdateVisitor

      VisitorDTO saveOrUpdateVisitor(VisitorRequestDto authorizedRequestDto)
      Creates a new visitor or update based on the provided data.
      Parameters:
      authorizedRequestDto - Object containing the necessary data to create a new authorization.
      Returns:
      An AuthorizedDTO object representing the newly created authorization.

    • getVisitorByDocNumber

      VisitorDTO getVisitorByDocNumber(Long docNumber)
      This method finds and returns the visitor associated with the given document number.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - The document number of the visitor.
      Returns:
      VisitorDTO.

    • deleteVisitor

      VisitorDTO deleteVisitor(Long docNumber)
      Deactivates a visitor by their document number.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - The document number of the visitor to deactivate.
      Returns:
      VisitorDTO representing the deactivated visitor.
